verses.verse: Lord <S%H3068><s%>, who shall stay <S%H1481><s%> in your tabernacle <S%H168><s%>? who shall live <S%H7931><s%> in your holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%>?
He that walks <S%H1980><s%> uprightly <S%H8549><s%>, and works <S%H6466><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and speaks <S%H1696><s%> the truth <S%H571><s%> in his heart <S%H3824><s%>.

He that backbites <S%H7270><s%> not with his tongue <S%H3956><s%>, nor does <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> to his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, nor takes up <S%H5375><s%> a reproach <S%H2781><s%> against his neighbor <S%H7138><s%>.

In whose eyes <S%H5869><s%> a vile person <S%H3988><s%> is despised <S%H959><s%>; but he honors <S%H3513><s%> them that fear <S%H3373><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>. He that swears <S%H7650><s%> to his own hurt <S%H7489><s%>, and changes not <S%H4171><s%>.

He that puts not out <S%H5414><s%> his money <S%H3701><s%> to usury <S%H5392><s%>, nor takes <S%H3947><s%> reward <S%H7810><s%> against the innocent <S%H5355><s%>. He that does <S%H6213><s%> these things shall never <S%H5769><s%> be moved <S%H4131><s%>.
